::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod follows. 
"After the great wars, when a few Decepticons were granted amasty, and
being reconstructed as Predicons, and most of the Autobots were being
deactivated, I chose tho be reconstructed. I leaft Cybertron, to take my
TargetMaster back to Nebulos. I've been exploring the galaxy since.
I heard about the Beast Wars. And when Hell Beast and his Preds came
here, I followed. I was so far away, that I jest made it."
